actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase in 3 steps the deduction for net capital gains for individuals from 60 percent to 75 percent.

summary.text: Capital Growth Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax deduction for capital gains for individuals to 65 percent in 1984, to 70 percent in 1985, and to 75 percent in years after 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase in 3 steps the deduction for net capital gains for individuals from 60 percent to 75 percent.
